080813:
On Aug 8, 2013, at 10:05 AM, "Irene Williams" <iwilliams@21ct.com> wrote:

Hi Karen - Just a quick mate to thank you for coming to our offices with Brian and James. We were honored to be able to host you and I really enjoyed the conversation, and your quick and decisive leadership. Its clear the State of Texas will be on a path to leading other states in cyber security practice with you at the helm.

I want to reiterate my request to help you in any way as you navigate the waters or your new position. We're in your backyard, and we work daily and successfully on the challenges faced in cyber with many Texas and national based companies. We can give you use cases for what's working, what the challenges are, expert analysts, technologists, etc.

I would also like to support the rodeo gala. Please let me know if we can sponsor ,buy a table, help on a committee, etc.

Finally, I'd love to have lunch - just to get to know each other better and share stories and support as women leaders in technology.

Let me know if you have open dates in the coming weeks,

Best,

Irene Williams

CEO
21CT

Talk soon!

~Karen

Karen,

I wanted to reach out to you regarding a conversation I had with Claire yesterday. As you know, I was one of the hosts for Claire and her team during her visit to the HP Houston facility. Also, you and I briefly met at the Board meeting on October 31st.
